name: Daruma (KuroiX)
description:
The game was made with a focus on level design with the theme "taking cover". There is one seeker that can look at the whole map from above, but only through a small view cone. The seeker needs to find the runners, the other type of player, that run around the map, gather coins, take cover, and try to bring their coins to the seeker castle.

How to play

You need at least 3 players, 2 controllers, and 2 monitors for the game to work. The seeker player plays with keyboard and mouse on the first monitor, while the other players play with controllers on the second monitor, ideally facing the other direction.
